channel.title: [Competition] 99 bottles of beer on the wall
channel.description:
Since lawl brought it up in that other topic, I think it will be fun and funny to actually do it. So....
[b]Guideline(s): [/b]You must have the program output "99 bottles of beer on the wall" ANY way you want [b]Important thing(s) to remember: [/b]the more efficient the program and the smaller the program, the more likely you will win
Well get started lol

item.title: [Competition] 99 bottles of beer on the wall
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:19, topic:106653”][quote author=Protosstribe link=topic=152675.msg1441597#msg1441597 date=1181162529]
I am not sure if I actually understood it correctly, but as far as I could see, we were about to output “99 bottles of beer on the wall”, in for example the command prompt window. So here is my results of 1 minutes writing:

class Bottles { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.print("99 bottles of beer on the wall"); } }
[/quote]That’s what I though as well, but then I was like… “Well, that wouldn’t make any sense :/”[/quote]that doesn’t make any sense

item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Private Server Style v2:

HOA I CUM PILE DIS NAD HOW I GO BKA TO ZSCERP? HLOP PLOZ MAI CODDDE IS BALOW: [code] public Void bootlez { for(i=0, i=99; i+) { sendMessage("i bottlez of ber on the woal, i botulez of bear, tak on doun pas wit round i botlez of ber")

}
[/code]
and herz wout i do to maek it work

if(command = "botlez") botlez;

help 2me pls i ll igivnu rep++

kay, but fo rael, I think this follows all standards

package com.io9Labs.bottlez
public class Bottlez {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int i = 99;
        while(true) {
            if(i == 1) {
                out.println("One bottle of beer on the wall, One more bottle of beer.\n Take one down," +
                                   "pass it around, no more bottles of beer on the wall");
            } else if(i == 0) {
                Runtime.getRuntime().exec("pause");
            } else {
                out.print(Integer.toString(i) + " bottles of beer on the wall, " + Integer.toString(i) + "bottles of beer.");
                out.println(" Take one down, pass it around, " + Integer.toString(i--) + " bottles of beer on the wall.")
            }
        }
    }
}

System.out.println = misc.println/sendMessage for moparscapers

[quote=“I Am Olan14, post:25, topic:106653”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=152675.msg1439926#msg1439926 date=1181117509]

import javax.swing.*;

public class Start extends JFrame
{
	private static JTextArea jta;
	public static void main(String[] args) { JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true); new Start().setVisible(true); loop(); }
	public Start() { super("99 bottles of beer on the wall"); start(); }
	private void start()
	{
		setDefaultCloseOperation(3);
		JPanel main = new JPanel();
		main = (JPanel)this.getContentPane();
		jta = new JTextArea(20, 50);
		main.add(new JScrollPane(jta));
		pack();
	}

	private static void loop()
	{
		for (int i = 99; i > -2; i--)
		{
			String msg = "";
			if (i >= 2)
			{
				int i2 = i - 1;
				String s = "";
				if (i2 == 1)
				{
					msg = "2 bottles of beer on the wall, 2 bottles of beer.\n" +
					"Take one down and pass it around, 1 bottle of beer on the wall.";
				}
				else
				{
					s = " bottles ";
					msg = i + s + "of beer on the wall, " + i + s + "of beer.\n" +
					"Take one down and pass it around, " + i2 + s + "of beer on the wall.";
				}
			}
			else if (i == 1)
			{
				msg = "1 bottle of beer on the wall, 1 bottle of beer.\n" +
				"Take one down and pass it around, no more bottles of beer on the wall.";
			}
			else if (i == 0)
			{
				msg = "No more bottles of beer on the wall, no more bottles of beer.\n" +
				"Go to the store and buy some more, 99 bottles of beer on the wall.\n\n";
			}
			else
				loop();
			try { Thread.sleep(5000); jta.setText(jta.getText() + msg + "\n\n"); }
			catch (InterruptedException e) { }
		}
	}
}

Lol. Mine includes an awesome decorated JFrame and the final verses fixed… http://99-bottles-of-beer.net/lyrics.html
[/quote]

Bad Mod, reached end of fiel while parsing :([/quote]

It worked for me

item.title: [Competition] 99 bottles of beer on the wall
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:11, topic:106653”][code]
import javax.swing.*;

public class Start extends JFrame
{
private static JTextArea jta;
public static void main(String[] args) { JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true); new Start().setVisible(true); loop(); }
public Start() { super(“99 bottles of beer on the wall”); start(); }
private void start()
{
setDefaultCloseOperation(3);
JPanel main = new JPanel();
main = (JPanel)this.getContentPane();
jta = new JTextArea(20, 50);
main.add(new JScrollPane(jta));
pack();
}

private static void loop()
{
	for (int i = 99; i > -2; i--)
	{
		String msg = "";
		if (i >= 2)
		{
			int i2 = i - 1;
			String s = "";
			if (i2 == 1)
			{
				msg = "2 bottles of beer on the wall, 2 bottles of beer.\n" +
				"Take one down and pass it around, 1 bottle of beer on the wall.";
			}
			else
			{
				s = " bottles ";
				msg = i + s + "of beer on the wall, " + i + s + "of beer.\n" +
				"Take one down and pass it around, " + i2 + s + "of beer on the wall.";
			}
		}
		else if (i == 1)
		{
			msg = "1 bottle of beer on the wall, 1 bottle of beer.\n" +
			"Take one down and pass it around, no more bottles of beer on the wall.";
		}
		else if (i == 0)
		{
			msg = "No more bottles of beer on the wall, no more bottles of beer.\n" +
			"Go to the store and buy some more, 99 bottles of beer on the wall.\n\n";
		}
		else
			loop();
		try { Thread.sleep(5000); jta.setText(jta.getText() + msg + "\n\n"); }
		catch (InterruptedException e) { }
	}
}

}
[/code]

Lol. Mine includes an awesome decorated JFrame and the final verses fixed… http://99-bottles-of-beer.net/lyrics.html[/quote]

Bad Mod, reached end of fiel while parsing

item.title: [Competition] 99 bottles of beer on the wall
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[code]public class beer
{
public static void main(String[] a)
{
for(int i = 99; i >=0; i–)
{
Thread T = new Thread();
if(i < 2)
{
if(i == 1)
{
System.out.println(i + " bottle of beer on the wall, " + i + " bottle of beer.");
System.out.println(“Take 1 down pass it arround, no more bottles of beer on the wall.\n”);
}
else
{
System.out.println("No more bottles of beer on the wall, no more bottles of beer. “);
System.out.println(“Go to the store and buy some more, 99 bottles of beer on the wall.\n”);
}
}
else
{
System.out.println(i + " bottles of beer on the wall, " + i + " bottles of beer.”);
System.out.println(“Take 1 down pass it arround, " + (i - 1) + " bottles of beer on the wall.\n”);
}
try
{
T.sleep(1000);
}
catch(InterruptedException e)
{

		}
	}
}

}[/code]

very easy right?
and perfect

item.title: [Competition] 99 bottles of beer on the wall
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[code]import java.net.;
import java.io.;
import javax.swing.*;

public class bottles extends javax.swing.JFrame {

bottles frame;
private javax.swing.JTextArea NinetyNineArea;
private javax.swing.JButton startButton;
private javax.swing.JButton aboutButton;
private javax.swing.JButton resetButton;
private javax.swing.JScrollPane jScrollPane1;

public bottles() {
    init();
}

private void init() {
    jScrollPane1 = new javax.swing.JScrollPane();
    NinetyNineArea = new javax.swing.JTextArea();
    startButton = new javax.swing.JButton();
    aboutButton = new javax.swing.JButton();
    resetButton = new javax.swing.JButton();

    setDefaultCloseOperation(javax.swing.WindowConstants.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
    setTitle("99 Bottles");
    NinetyNineArea.setColumns(20);
    NinetyNineArea.setRows(5);
    jScrollPane1.setViewportView(NinetyNineArea);

    startButton.setText("Start");
    startButton.addActionListener(new java.awt.event.ActionListener() {
        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
            startButtonActionPerformed(evt);
        }
    });

    aboutButton.setText("About");
    aboutButton.addActionListener(new java.awt.event.ActionListener() {
        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
            aboutButtonActionPerformed(evt);
        }
    });

    resetButton.setText("Reset");
    resetButton.addActionListener(new java.awt.event.ActionListener() {
        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
            resetButtonActionPerformed(evt);
        }
    });

    javax.swing.GroupLayout layout = new javax.swing.GroupLayout(getContentPane());
    getContentPane().setLayout(layout);
    layout.setHorizontalGroup(
        layout.createParallelGroup(javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.LEADING)
        .addGroup(layout.createSequentialGroup()
            .addGap(21, 21, 21)
            .addGroup(layout.createParallelGroup(javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.TRAILING, false)
                .addGroup(layout.createSequentialGroup()
                    .addComponent(resetButton)
                    .addGap(114, 114, 114)
                    .addComponent(startButton)
                    .addPreferredGap(javax.swing.LayoutStyle.ComponentPlacement.RELATED, javax.swing.GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, Short.MAX_VALUE)
                    .addComponent(aboutButton))
                .addComponent(jScrollPane1, javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.LEADING, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE, 429, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE))
            .addContainerGap(20, Short.MAX_VALUE))
    );
    layout.setVerticalGroup(
        layout.createParallelGroup(javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.LEADING)
        .addGroup(layout.createSequentialGroup()
            .addGap(22, 22, 22)
            .addComponent(jScrollPane1, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE, 170, javax.swing.GroupLayout.PREFERRED_SIZE)
            .addPreferredGap(javax.swing.LayoutStyle.ComponentPlacement.RELATED)
            .addGroup(layout.createParallelGroup(javax.swing.GroupLayout.Alignment.BASELINE)
                .addComponent(aboutButton)
                .addComponent(resetButton)
                .addComponent(startButton))
            .addContainerGap(javax.swing.GroupLayout.DEFAULT_SIZE, Short.MAX_VALUE))
    );
    pack();
}                      

private void aboutButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(frame,
"99 Bottles of bear on the wall. The song, made by Yz85Racer",
"About",
JOptionPane.PLAIN_MESSAGE);
}                                        

private void resetButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
	NinetyNineArea.setText("");
}                                        

private void startButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
     for (int x = 99; x > 0; x--) {
                    NinetyNineArea.append(x + " bottles of beer on the wall.\n" + x + " bottles of beer.\n");
		NinetyNineArea.append("Take one down and pass it around...\n " + (x-1) + " bottles of beer on the wall.\n");
     }
}                                        


public static void main(String args[]) {
    java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
        public void run() {
            new bottles().setVisible(true);
        }
    });
}

}
[/code]

public class beers {
public static void main(String args[])
{
for(int b = 99; b > 0; b--) {
System.out.println(b+" bottles of beer on the wall");
System.out.println(b+" bottles of beer");
System.out.println("take one down pass it around");
if(b-1 != 0)
{
System.out.println(b-1+" bottles of beer on the wall");
System.out.println("");
}
else { System.out.println("!no bottles of beer on the wall!"); }
}
System.out.println("eah who drunk all the beers :-/");
System.out.println("*looks at silab*");
System.out.println("");
}
}

item.title: [Competition] 99 bottles of beer on the wall
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

kk here is mine, its got the right ending, and i used strings for any text that occured more then once in the coding, which shortened it up.

public class temp
{
	public static void main(String[] args)
	{
		for (int a=99;a>=0;a--)
		{
			int b=a-1;
			String c=" bottles of beer";
			String d=" on the wall";
			String e= b+c+d+".\n";
			String f=" bottle of beer";
			String g="Take one down and pass it around";
			String h="o more";
			String i="\n";
			if (a>1)
			System.out.print(i+a+c+d+", "+a+c+"."+i+g+", "+e);
			else if(a==1)
			System.out.print(i+a+f+d+", "+a+f+"."+i+g+", n"+h+c+d+"."+i);
			else if(a==0)
			System.out.print(i+"N"+h+c+d+", n"+h+c+".\nGo to the store and buy some more, 99"+c+d+"."+i+i);
		}
	}
}

a.substring(14, 15) + a.substring(7, 8) + a.substring(21, 22) + a.substring(0, 1) + a.substring(17, 18) + a.substring(8, 9) + a.substring(0, 1) + a.substring(4, 5) + a.substring(7, 8) + a.substring(7, a.substring(20, 21) + a.substring(17, 18) + a.substring(23, 24) + a.substring(16, 17) + a.substring(6, 7) + a.substring(2, 3) + a.substring(0, 1) + --d + a.substring(0, 1) + a.substring(4, 5) + a.substring(17, 18) + a.substring(22, 23) + a.substring(22, 23) + a.substring(14, 15) + a.substring(7, 8) + a.substring(21, 22) + a.substring(0, 1) + a.substring(17, 18) + a.substring(8, 9) + item.title: [Competition] 99 bottles of beer on the wall
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

import javax.swing.*;

public class Start extends JFrame
{
	private static JTextArea jta;
	public static void main(String[] args) { JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true); new Start().setVisible(true); loop(); }
	public Start() { super("99 bottles of beer on the wall"); start(); }
	private void start()
	{
		setDefaultCloseOperation(3);
		JPanel main = new JPanel();
		main = (JPanel)this.getContentPane();
		jta = new JTextArea(20, 50);
		main.add(new JScrollPane(jta));
		pack();
	}

	private static void loop()
	{
		for (int i = 99; i > -2; i--)
		{
			String msg = "";
			if (i >= 2)
			{
				int i2 = i - 1;
				String s = "";
				if (i2 == 1)
				{
					msg = "2 bottles of beer on the wall, 2 bottles of beer.\n" +
					"Take one down and pass it around, 1 bottle of beer on the wall.";
				}
				else
				{
					s = " bottles ";
					msg = i + s + "of beer on the wall, " + i + s + "of beer.\n" +
					"Take one down and pass it around, " + i2 + s + "of beer on the wall.";
				}
			}
			else if (i == 1)
			{
				msg = "1 bottle of beer on the wall, 1 bottle of beer.\n" +
				"Take one down and pass it around, no more bottles of beer on the wall.";
			}
			else if (i == 0)
			{
				msg = "No more bottles of beer on the wall, no more bottles of beer.\n" +
				"Go to the store and buy some more, 99 bottles of beer on the wall.\n\n";
			}
			else
				loop();
			try { Thread.sleep(5000); jta.setText(jta.getText() + msg + "\n\n"); }
			catch (InterruptedException e) { }
		}
	}
}

Lol. Mine includes an awesome decorated JFrame and the final verses fixed… http://99-bottles-of-beer.net/lyrics.html

Read full topic
